name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: High-performance laptop with M3 Pro chip, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Perfect for professionals and creators. Features stunning Retina display and all-day battery life.

name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Latest smartphone with A17 Pro chip, 256GB storage, titanium design. Advanced camera system with 48MP main camera. 5G enabled.

name: AirPods Pro 2nd Gen
description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and adaptive transparency. Up to 6 hours listening time.

name: iPad Air 11-inch
description: Versatile tablet with M2 chip, 128GB storage. Perfect for work and entertainment. Supports Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise canceling wireless headphones with exceptional sound quality. 30-hour battery life and multipoint connection.

name: Samsung 65-inch 4K Smart TV
description: Crystal UHD 4K television with HDR, smart hub, and voice assistant integration. Perfect for streaming and gaming.

name: Dell XPS 13 Laptop
description: Ultra-portable laptop with Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display. Ideal for business and travel.

name: Canon EOS R6 Camera
description: Professional mirrorless camera with 20MP full-frame sensor, 4K video, and advanced autofocus. Perfect for photography enthusiasts.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with customizable buttons, quiet clicks, and precision tracking. Works on any surface.

name: PlayStation 5 Console
description: Next-gen gaming console with ultra-fast SSD, haptic feedback controller, and stunning graphics. Includes 825GB storage.

name: Dyson V15 Vacuum Cleaner
description: Powerful cordless vacuum with laser detection, HEPA filtration, and up to 60 minutes runtime. Perfect for deep cleaning.

name: Ninja Air Fryer
description: 6-quart air fryer with rapid cooking technology. Cook healthy meals with little to no oil. 7 cooking functions.

name: Keurig K-Elite Coffee Maker
description: Single-serve coffee maker with iced coffee capability, 5 cup sizes, and strong brew setting. Compatible with all K-Cup pods.

name: iRobot Roomba j7+
description: Smart robot vacuum with automatic dirt disposal, obstacle avoidance, and app control. Maps your home for efficient cleaning.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1
description: Multi-cooker with pressure cooker, slow cooker, rice cooker, steamer, and more. 6-quart capacity for families.

name: Philips Hue Starter Kit
description: Smart LED light bulbs with hub, app control, and voice assistant integration. 16 million colors and scheduling features.

name: KitchenAid Stand Mixer
description: 5-quart tilt-head stand mixer with 10 speeds. Includes dough hook, whisk, and beater. Perfect for baking enthusiasts.

name: Nest Learning Thermostat
description: Smart thermostat that learns your schedule and saves energy. Control from anywhere with smartphone app.

name: Herman Miller Aeron Chair
description: Ergonomic office chair with adjustable lumbar support, breathable mesh, and 12-year warranty. Size B (medium).

name: Standing Desk Electric
description: Height-adjustable standing desk with memory presets, 48x30 inch surface, and cable management. Supports up to 300 lbs.

name: Modern Sofa 3-Seater
description: Contemporary fabric sofa with deep cushions and solid wood frame. Available in gray. Comfortable for everyday use.

name: Queen Size Bed Frame
description: Upholstered platform bed frame with tufted headboard. No box spring needed. Easy assembly with included tools.

name: Peloton Bike+
description: Premium indoor cycling bike with rotating touchscreen, auto-follow resistance, and access to live classes. Includes 3-month membership.

name: Bowflex Adjustable Dumbbells
description: Space-saving dumbbells that adjust from 5 to 52.5 lbs per hand. Replaces 15 sets of weights. Perfect for home gym.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Extra-thick 6mm yoga mat with non-slip surface and carrying strap. Made from eco-friendly TPE material. 72x24 inches.

name: Fitbit Charge 6
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water resistant to 50m.

name: Kindle Paperwhite
description: Waterproof e-reader with 6.8-inch glare-free display, adjustable warm light, and weeks of battery life. 16GB storage.

name: Bose SoundLink Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, 12-hour battery, and water-resistant design. Perfect for outdoor use.

name: Samsonite Carry-On Luggage
description: Hardside spinner suitcase with TSA lock, expandable capacity, and 10-year warranty. Lightweight and durable.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator Sunglasses
description: Classic metal frame sunglasses with polarized lenses and UV protection. Iconic style and superior clarity.

name: Leather Laptop Backpack
description: Professional backpack with padded laptop compartment (fits up to 15.6 inch), USB charging port, and water-resistant leather.

name: Anker PowerBank 20000mAh
description: High-capacity portable charger with fast charging, dual USB ports, and LED display. Can charge phone 4-5 times.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Gaming console with vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, and 64GB storage. Play at home or on the go.

name: Xbox Series X
description: Powerful gaming console with 4K gaming, 1TB SSD, and backwards compatibility. Includes Xbox Game Pass trial.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Advanced smartwatch with fitness tracking, ECG, blood oxygen monitoring, and always-on display. 41mm GPS model.
